trans-unit.source: Contains values used as identifiers by <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 包含用作标识符的值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: These identifiers are used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用这些标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent fields in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event raised when an item is added to a collection of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 标识向选定项的集合添加项时引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the result of an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection%2A> call is a single selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent> must be raised instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果结果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection%2A>调用是单个的选定的项，则<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent>必须改为引发。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection%2A>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event raised when an item is removed from a collection of selected items.
trans-unit.target: 标识从选定项的集合中移除项时引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the result of a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection%2A> call is a single selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent> will be raised instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果结果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection%2A>调用是单个的选定的项，则<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent>将改为引发。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementSelectedEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection%2A>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the event that is raised when a single item is selected (causing all previously selected items to become deselected).
trans-unit.target: 标识 （导致所有之前选中的项被取消选择） 选择单个项目时引发的事件。

trans-unit.source: If the result of either an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection%2A> or a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection%2A> call is more than one selected item, then an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementAddedToSelectionEvent> or <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent> event is raised.
trans-unit.target: 如果下列任一工具的结果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection%2A>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection%2A>调用为多个选定的项，则<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementAddedToSelectionEvent>或<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent>引发事件。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementRemovedFromSelectionEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPatternIdentifiers.ElementAddedToSelectionEvent> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.RemoveFromSelection%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.AddToSelection%2A>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.IsSelected*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.IsSelected*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ISelectionItemProvider.IsSelected*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"></xref> pattern.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern"></xref>模式。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation.SelectionContainer*> property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation.SelectionContainer*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern.SelectionItemPatternInformation.SelectionContainer*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation providers.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation client applications should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.SelectionItemPattern>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
